name: TUNAPADTWA
description:
" A long time ago in the Inca village of Tunapadtwa,
the recent seism have destroyed part of the houses, the place is missing.
Many of them are lacking space.

Find gold, rebuild a part of the village! "

Initially planned for the mode COMPO for lack of time I post in JAM mode.

SOFTWARE USED :

PAINT.NET, FIRE_ALPACA, AUDACITY, MUSIC MAKER JAM.

ENGINE :

GAME MAKER STUDIO 1.4

FONT :

Source Dafonts : Foo par Typodermic Fonts.

GRAPHICS,CODE AND SOUNDS BY ROBOWARRIOR.

CONTROL:

Use a gamepad preferably.

GAMEPAD:
Stick to move (A) to jump, (B) to shoot and interact (and pull rocks).

KEYBOARD:
WASD to move, (K) to jump , (L) to shoot and interact (and pull rocks).

Thanks for playing !!!

HMTL5 VERSION ON NEWGROUNDS :

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/715457
